currentlyReading.title: Big Dumb Eyes
currentlyReading.author: Nate Bargatze
currentlyReading.alt: Book cover of Big Dumb Eyes
currentlyReading.review: I first learned about Nate back when Valve made a Portal spin-off called "Aperture Desk Job" to help demo the Steam Deck's capabilities. His performance in the game and on stage is whip-smart and hilarious; same goes for this book.
